item.title: 4.3 关注项目
item.description: 关注项目 # istio/istio # Connect, secure, control, and observe services. https://istio.io envoyproxy/envoy # Cloud-native high-performance edge/middle/service proxy https://www.envoyproxy.io kiali/kiali # Kiali project, observability for the Istio service mesh mosn/mosn # MOSN is a cloud native proxy for edge or service mesh. https://mosn.io rancher/rio Application Deployment Engine for Kubernetes https://rio.io 其他 # kubernetes/kubernetes # Production-Grade Container Scheduling and Management https://kubernetes.io openzipkin/zipkin # Zipkin is a distributed tracing system https://zipkin.
